name: Lunar Cycle
description:
Lunar Cycle

A game about unicycling in low gravity!

Works on PC and mobile.

Feel free to share your high score in the comments  (mine is 83!)

Made in 3 hours for TriJam #52 game jam.

Software Used: Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop.

(Audio is from a royalty-free archive and was created outside of the jam time)
